name: part_009
file: tmp_【＃一条莉々華生誕祭2025】初の生誕ライブ開幕！！一条莉々華生誕祭ライブ2025【一条莉々華⧸hololive DEV_IS　ReGLOSS】 [HB8sU0qsePE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Ichijou Ririka and Vestia Zeta perform the song 'Break It Down' on stage. The scene features vibrant lighting and high-energy choreography.
The performance of 'Break It Down' concludes. The stage darkens briefly before Ririka is joined by the other members of ReGLOSS.
MC section. Ririka, holding an Otome plushie, introduces the next song with the full ReGLOSS group.
ReGLOSS performs the song 'SUPER DUPER' together on stage in an amusement park-themed setting.

subtitles.original: You made my day 憧れてただけ 待って 今は何も響かない
subtitles.english: You made my day, I was just longing for it; wait, now nothing resonates with me

subtitles.original: I know who I am
subtitles.english: I know who I am

subtitles.original: ブランディングに我慢 今は完全無視 お望み通り Greedy style
subtitles.english: Enduring the branding; now I completely ignore it, just as you wish, Greedy style

subtitles.original: ダサい僻みも興味ないの ありのままでいたい
subtitles.english: I'm not interested in uncool prejudices; I want to stay as I am

subtitles.original: Going my way 放っといて 止めらんない 熱に任せて
subtitles.english: Going my way, leave me alone; I can't be stopped, leaving it to the passion

subtitles.original: こりごりだろ Rule は break it down 我慢できない let me free
subtitles.english: You've had enough, right? Break down the rules; I can't hold back, let me free

subtitles.original: We are special でしょう揺るがないプライド それだけでいいの
subtitles.english: We are special, right? An unwavering pride, that's all I need

subtitles.original: たらればだらけの虚ろな日々を Break it down, break it down
subtitles.english: The hollow days full of "what ifs"; Break it down, break it down

subtitles.original: We are special でしょう誰に言われても 私は歌うよ
subtitles.english: We are special, right? No matter what anyone says, I will sing

subtitles.original: アンフェアばかりの世界など Break it down, break it down 進め
subtitles.english: A world full of unfairness and such; Break it down, break it down, move forward

subtitles.original: ハイテクなメイクやファッション Self-love には敵わないよ
subtitles.english: High-tech makeup and fashion; they can't compete with self-love

subtitles.original: 包み隠さず 誰のものでもないでしょ
subtitles.english: Not hiding anything; it doesn't belong to anyone, right?

subtitles.original: いい加減いい大人だよね
subtitles.english: It's about time, we're grown adults, right?

subtitles.original: Inilah aku apa adanya Tidak sempurna tapi sepenuhnya diriku
subtitles.english: This is who I am as I am; Not perfect but completely myself

subtitles.original: でも今は楽しいよ ありのままでいられるから
subtitles.english: But it's fun now; because I can stay as I am

subtitles.original: Going my way 放っといて 止めらんない 熱に任せて
subtitles.english: Going my way, leave me alone; I can't be stopped, leaving it to the passion

subtitles.original: こりごりだろ Rule は break it down 我慢できない let me free
subtitles.english: You've had enough, right? Break down the rules; I can't hold back, let me free

subtitles.original: We are special でしょう揺るがないプライド それだけでいいの
subtitles.english: We are special, right? An unwavering pride, that's all I need

subtitles.original: たらればだらけの虚ろな日々を Break it down, break it down
subtitles.english: The hollow days full of "what ifs"; Break it down, break it down

subtitles.original: We are special でしょう誰に言われても 私は歌うよ
subtitles.english: We are special, right? No matter what anyone says, I will sing

subtitles.original: アンフェアばかりの世界など Break it down, break it down 進め
subtitles.english: A world full of unfairness and such; Break it down, break it down, move forward

subtitles.original: Going my way 放っといて 止めらんない 熱に任せて
subtitles.english: Going my way, leave me alone; I can't be stopped, leaving it to the passion

subtitles.original: こりごりだろ Rule は break it down 我慢できない let me free
subtitles.english: You've had enough, right? Break down the rules; I can't hold back, let me free

subtitles.original: 次の曲は、SUPER DUPER！
subtitles.english: The next song is... SUPER DUPER!

subtitles.original: ReGLOSS で、SUPER DUPER！ 聴いてください！
subtitles.english: With ReGLOSS, SUPER DUPER! Please listen!

subtitles.original: 目くるめく好奇心は森羅万象 行く末 神さえも知らぬ場所
subtitles.english: Dazzling curiosity is all creation; The destination, a place even God doesn't know

subtitles.original: 混じり気のない情熱が 澄ました空虚を逆なでしたとこ
subtitles.english: Where pure passion rubs against the cleared emptiness

subtitles.original: 寝静まる夜も とめどないアドバンス 猛烈な目まぐるしい時代も全部
subtitles.english: Even in the dead of night, an endless advance; Even the intensely dizzying era, all of it

subtitles.original: 忘却の彼方へ笑い飛ばそう
subtitles.english: Let's laugh it off to the far side of oblivion

subtitles.original: Give me the, give me the beat right now!
subtitles.english: Give me the, give me the beat right now!

subtitles.original: SUPER DUPER 共鳴十色のシャングリラ 陽が暮れるまで踊ろうよ
subtitles.english: SUPER DUPER, a Shangri-La of ten resonant colors; Let's dance until the sun goes down

subtitles.original: 誰が何と言おうと気にしない 未開拓
subtitles.english: No matter what anyone says, I don't care; unexplored

subtitles.original: 衝動のリズムだけ 美しい声を響かせて
subtitles.english: Only the rhythm of impulse; let the beautiful voices ring out

subtitles.original: 俯いた世界を 変えてみせよう
subtitles.english: Let's change the downcast world

subtitles.original: SUPER DUPER 今月今宵 満を持して形勢逆転 とっておき決める激アツ局面
subtitles.english: SUPER DUPER, tonight, fully prepared for a turnaround; A super-hot situation to pull out the ace in the hole

subtitles.original: 転生しても もう一度ここへカムバック 純正そのものがセンセーショナルな漫画
subtitles.english: Even if I reincarnate, I'll come back here again; Purity itself is a sensational manga

subtitles.original: ビギナーから一躍 羽ばたいてオリジナル 一番目指し走り出す 血肉分けしジーニアス
subtitles.english: From a beginner to a sudden leap, taking flight as an original; Starting to run for number one, a blood-related genius

subtitles.original: 巷を揺るがすポイズンサバイブ 打ち落としたって問題ない
subtitles.english: Poison survive shaking the streets; no problem even if it's shot down

subtitles.original: たぎりつく胸を 謳歌し止まないもの 疑うことも知らないまま
subtitles.english: Something that never stops celebrating the burning chest; without even knowing doubt

subtitles.original: さあ行っとけ 覚悟はできてるよ
subtitles.english: Come on, go for it, I'm ready

subtitles.original: Give me the, give me the beat right now!
subtitles.english: Give me the, give me the beat right now!

subtitles.original: SUPER DUPER 共鳴十色のシャングリラ 陽が暮れるまで踊ろうよ 誰が何と言おうと気にしない 未開拓
subtitles.english: SUPER DUPER, a Shangri-La of ten resonant colors; Let's dance until the sun goes down, no matter what anyone says, I don't care, unexplored
